alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Van Buren; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern De Kalb, northwestern Van Buren, northern Warren, southwestern White and east central Cannon Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of McMinnville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McMinnville, Spencer, Doyle, Centertown and Rock Island State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; De Kalb; Van Buren; Warren
